newsitem.title: USA: First Michigan terminates merger talks.
newsitem.headline: First Michigan terminates merger talks.

text.p: First Michigan Bank Corp said Wednesday the company had been in discussions over a possible merger, but those talks were ended.

"In response to unusual activity in the company's stock, First Michigan Bank Corp (FMBC) announced today that it had been engaged in possible merger discussions, but those discussions have been terminated," the company said in a statement.
No further information was given, and the company could not be immediately reached.
Shares of First Michigan were up 15/16 at 31, after earlier reaching a new 52-week high of 31-1/4.
